subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A frantic finish, in which Jimmie Johnson and Kurt Busch tangled on the track, gave Mark Martin his chance to claim the LifeLock.com 400.
snippet: A frantic finish, in which Jimmie Johnson and Kurt Busch tangled on the track, gave Mark Martin his chance to claim the LifeLock.com 400.
